# Data Manipulation with dplyr

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this chapter, you will be able to:

1. Create and modify variables with `mutate()`
2. Sort data with `arrange()`
3. Create grouped summaries with `group_by()` and `summarise()`
4. Handle missing data effectively
5. Apply conditional logic with `if_else()` and `case_when()`
